CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(Flag_Set__c),null,IF(Hours_Offset__c+Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_4_Hours__c, IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?flagsort=" & Case__r.AH_Case_Flag_Age_Text__c & "&file=" & $Setup.AH_CaseFlagPreferences__c.Age_4_Image__c, "L4", 16, 16), IF(Hours_Offset__c+ Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_3_Hours__c, IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?flagsort=" & Case__r.AH_Case_Flag_Age_Text__c & "&file=" & $Setup.AH_CaseFlagPreferences__c.Age_3_Image__c, "L3", 16, 16), IF(Hours_Offset__c+ Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_2_Hours__c, IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?flagsort=" & Case__r.AH_Case_Flag_Age_Text__c & "&file=" & $Setup.AH_CaseFlagPreferences__c.Age_2_Image__c, "L2", 16, 16), IF(Hours_Offset__c+ Hours_Elapsed__c >= Case_Flags_Age_1_Hours__c, IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?flagsort=" & Case__r.AH_Case_Flag_Age_Text__c & "&file=" & $Setup.AH_CaseFlagPreferences__c.Age_1_Image__c, "L1",16,16), IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?flagsort=" & Case__r.AH_Case_Flag_Age_Text__c & "&file=" & $Setup.AH_CaseFlagPreferences__c.Age_1_Image__c, "L0",16,16)) ))))
CustomField.label: Flag
